title: How To Make Any Laptop Touch Screen!
description: (   ) --- Today's Mystery Video -   Neonode Airbar (USA Link) -  Neonode Airbar (International) -   This cool contraption can turn any laptop into a touchscreen. Results are better in Windows but it also sort of works on Mac OS.   More info from the manufacturer -  Air bar gives your PC touchscreen capabilities. The sleek, lightweight device emits an in visible light field over a PC screen that senses touch from any finger, stylus, paintbrush, etc. Air bar enables touch for Chromebooks PCs running Windows 8 or Windows 10.  FOLLOW ME IN THESE PLACES FOR UPDATES Twitter -  Facebook -  Instagram -  Google Plus -
